title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 119 - Charter Schools
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 119 - Charter Schools

State Regulations
§ 119.1 - Financing of charter schools
§ 119.2 - Participation in public employee retirement systems
§ 119.3 - Charter school reporting requirements
§ 119.4 - Hearings prior to the issuance, revision, or renewal of a charter school pursuant to Education Law section 2857(1)
§ 119.5 - Random selection process for charter school student applicants
§ 119.6 - Policies against harassment, bullying, and discrimination
§ 119.7 - Renewal of charters

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 119

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§ 11[1]-[7], 12[1], [2], 13[1]- [3], 14[1], [3], 101, 206, 207, 305[1], [2], [20], 2801[1]- [5], 2854, 2856, 2857[1], [2], 3713[1]-[2]; L. 1998, ch. 4; L. 2007, ch. 57, part
D-2, § 7;L. 2010, chs. 101, 482, §§ 2, 4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
